description: Try our easy to follow Captain America Porridge recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Porridge,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Raspberry,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Captain America Porridge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats with milk and 1/2 cup water in a small saucepan. Cook, stirring, until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until tender. Remove pan from heat and set aside, covered, for 5 minutes.

Divide porridge between 2 bowls and smooth tops. Spoon or pipe a little raspberry puree in centre of porridge. Top puree with blueberries. Spoon or pipe a ring of yoghurt around puree, then create another ring of puree around yoghurt. To serve, use yoghurt to create a star over blueberries.
